## SessionManager.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `SessionManager` class.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(server: string, options?: SessionManagerOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  server | string | SIP WebSocket Server URL. |
